author: ralexstokes
content: until we have topic advertisement in discv5, it seems like it could be challenging to find some attestation subnets (esp. if i have poor connectivity) -- has anyone seen this become an issue in practice?

author: ralexstokes
content: as i'm interpreting it now, it seems that i will just have to walk the discv5 DHT until i find enough nodes/ENRs to give me pointers to nodes on all the subnets

author: agemanning
content:
Haven't seen issue in practice yet. But this is why nodes with validators should be randomly subscribed to topics and also the topics they need. We are giving ourselves an epoch in advance to search for peers on subnets. 
I'm going to attempt to randomly search for peers rather than crawl and see how that goes. 
I might add a special search that can specify an ENR predicate which only counts peers in a query if the predicate is satisfied. In effect it will crawl the DHT until enough peers are found, but this could take a while depending on your UDP packet  timeout.

author: agemanning
content: I hear there is progress on the topic research, so we might not have to wait long for topics
